title: Mauritius Food Inflation
description: Cost of food in Mauritius increased 17.20 percent in October of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Food Inflation in Mauritius averaged 3.61 percent from 2013 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 18.40 percent in March of 2022 and a record low of -27.28 percent in December of 2013. This page provides - Mauritius Food Inflation - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Statistics Office, Mauritius
